titleStmt.title: A heavenly proclamation to fly Romish Babylon A sermon preached at Oxford in St Maries Nov. 21. 1613. By Sampson Price Master of Arts of Exeter Colledge and preacher to the citty of Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Price, Sampson, 1585 or 6-1630.

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: [par.]² A-D⁴ E² .
Running title reads: A heavenly proclamation to fly from Romish Babylon.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
